title: TypographyShop has Helvetica Fleece for the Holidays
content:
Warmer gear has finally arrived at [TypographyShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224211/http:/typographyshop.com/). We're pleased to present [Helvetica Neue Descending a Sweatshirt.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224211/http:/typographyshop.com/helvetica-sweatshirt.html)

They're on pre-release sale for $24.99 until December 31st, though we'll be shipping on the 20th. The classic ash crewneck is screened in black on a 9 oz. classic ash crewneck 90/10 sweatshirt.

We've sold its companion, [Helvetica Neue Descending a T-shirt](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224211/http:/typographyshop.com/helvetica_t-shirt.html) to buyers in over 20 countries now and hundreds of design blogs have featured us. We’ve got a new site and tons of new product coming in 2009, including some designs by some very prominent practitioners.

As Typophile has brought us a great deal of traffic this year I'd like to say thanks to our many buyers.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224211im_/http:/typophile.com/files/helvsweatborder_4645.jpg)
